Issue.creator: guoger
Issue.summary: EndToEnd reconfiguration and onboarding when an orderer node is joined It isn't influenced by outdated orderers
Issue.description: 1}} leader change 3. orderer1 is killed 4. consume its log to observe {{0/1 -> X}} leader change 5. submit tx to orderer5 2 is not currently performed, so that chunk of log is never consumed, which causes 4 to instantly pass. subsequently, 5 is executed too quickly and fails test. >
